body:
Comment 3: 
What to do with GOGC or GOGCTRACE? Include in go env output?
GORACE is displayed.

Whether to include GOMAXPROCS in go env's output or not
depends IMHO on the intended use of go env:
Is go env used to set up shell variables which are needed
in build scripts or is go env a tool to check your current
Go configuration (and a reminder that it is GOGCTRACE and
not GOTRACEGC)?
In the first case there is no need for GOMAXPROCS (or GOGC...),
in the second case it would be helpful.

I use go env in both ways, so I'd like to see all honored
environment variables being output, but I understand Dave's
objection.
